Как покупать с Безопасной сделкой: How to buy with Safe Deal
Выберите интересный вам товар: Choose the item you are interested in
Свяжитесь с продавцом и договоритесь об: Contact the seller and agree on the final price and conditions for the item delivery
Оплатите товар указав свой кошелёк для с: Pay for the item by specifying your wallet for refunds and wait for payment confirmation
Получите товар убедившись, что он соотве: Receive the item and make sure it matches the description
Подтвердите получение товара, и мы перев: Confirm receipt of the item, and we will transfer money to the seller
Что если товар не получен или не соответ: What if I didn't receive the item or it isn't as described?
Вы можете открыть спор и такие случаи ра: You can open a dispute and such cases are handled by our technical support individually. If the item is not as described or has not been received, we will refund your payment.
Что если я откажусь покупать?: What if I refuse to buy?
Сообщите об этом продавцу до того, как о: Please inform the seller about this before he ships or hands over the item to you. And we will refund the payment to your wallet.
Товар уже оплачен:: The item has already been paid for:
Покупатель вносит деньги за товар. Перед: The buyer pays money for the item. Hand it over or ship it and receive cryptocurrency in your wallet.
Как продавать с Безопасной сделкой:: How to sell with Safe Trade:
Получите заявку о сделке: Receive a request for a deal
Договоритесь об окончательной сумме и в: Agree on the final price and the cryptocurrency
Дождитесь оплаты покупателем: Wait for the buyer to pay
Передайте или отправьте товар: Hand over or ship the item
Когда покупатель получит товар мы переве: When the buyer receives the item, we will transfer the cryptocurrency to your wallet.
Что если покупатель откажется от товара?: What if the buyer refuses the item?
Вы можете открыть спор и такие случаи ра: You can open a dispute and such cases are handled by our technical support individually. If you can prove that the item was handed over or shipped, we will transfer the payment to you. If the item did not match the description or was not shipped, then we will refund the cryptocurrency to the buyer.
Что если я откажусь продавать?: What if I refuse to sell?
Просто закройте объявление или отмените: Just close the ad or cancel the request, we will refund the payment to the buyer.
Для того, чтобы завершить регистрацию, п: In order to complete the registration, follow the link in the letter that we sent to the email address you provided.
Если у вас возникли проблемы сообщите на: If you have any problems please email us at this address.
Пожалуйста, принимайте участие в разрабо: Please take part in the development of our platform. If you have any suggestions regarding the platform's work, email us at this address.
Произошла ошибка. Попробуйте позже: An error has occurred. Please try again later
Для смены имени обратитесь к администрац: Please, contact the administration if you want to change your name.
Для смены ID обратитесь в тех. поддержку: Please, contact the administration if you want to change the ID
Пожалуйста, введите Antares ID и сумму д: Please, enter Antares ID and amount for withdrawal
Оферта о заключении договора оказания ус: Offer to conclude a service agreement
Настоящий документ является предложением: This document is an offer of ANTARES MARKET LIMITED (hereinafter – “the Company") to registered users of ANTARES MARKET (hereinafter - "users" or "you") to conclude a framework agreement for the provision of services (hereinafter – “the Agreement") on the following conditions (hereinafter - "the offer").
В оферте могут встречаться термины, как: The offer may contain terms as defined in the ANTARES MARKET Terms of Use.
1.1. Договор определяет общие условия об: 1.1. The Agreement defines the general terms of the obligations arising between the Company and users when the Company provides information, as well as technical or advertising services (hereinafter referred to as "services"). These conditions can be supplemented and clarified in the future by concluding separate agreements (transactions) by the parties based on the Agreement on the provision of services on ANTARES MARKET or other sites on which the Company provides services.
1.2. Заключаемый Договор представляет со: 1.2. The concluded Agreement is an agreement with open terms. The essential conditions of each transaction for the provision of services made on the service are generated online individually for the user using the ANTARES MARKET platform interface, through which users select the service and its parameters, and the parties agree on the terms of the transaction.
2. Заключение Договора. Заказ услуг: 2. Conclusion of the Agreement. Service order
2.1. Оферта считается акцептованной поль: 2.1. The offer shall be considered accepted by the user, and the Agreement between the Company and the user shall be considered concluded from the moment the user pays for the services under the relevant transaction (in this case, payment is made simultaneously with the conclusion of the Agreement) or from the moment an advance payment is made for services ordered in the future. The terms of the concluded Agreement shall apply to all subsequent transactions between the user and the Company. The contract can be concluded only with a user who is a capable individual or a legal entity registered in the prescribed manner.
2.2. Каждый заказ конкретных услуг в рам: 2.2. Each order for specific services under the Agreement is an independent transaction for the provision of services of an information, technical or advertising nature. A transaction pursuant to this Agreement may be concluded in relation to the services provided on ANTARES MARKET and available for ordering and payment at the time the user contacts one ANTARES MARKET service or another.
2.3. Оплата заказа признается акцептом п: 2.3. Payment for an order is recognised as the user's acceptance of the offer to conclude a transaction under the terms agreed by the parties.
2.4. Пользователь оформляет каждый заказ: 2.4. The user completes each service order in accordance with the terms of the current version of the offer and the terms of the corresponding service. The terms of all ANTARES MARKET services that are posted on ANTARES MARKET at the time services are ordered are an integral part of the offer. Orders are made online.
2.5. Совершая акцепт оферты, вы выражает: 2.5. By accepting the offer, you agree that the fact of performing certain actions on ANTARES MARKET, including the use of professional technical tools, execution of commands through the service interface (pressing buttons, clicks), making a payment and other similar actions implies your declaration of intent in relation to ordering and/or activating services in accordance with the service parameters and prices indicated on ANTARES MARKET.
3.1. Услуги оказываются на всей территор: 3.1. Services are provided throughout the territory of use of ANTARES MARKET.
3.2. Условиями получения пользователем у: 3.2. The conditions for users to receive the Company's services are payment for services and users’ compliance with the service rules established in the documents listed in this clause, as well as in the instructions presented in the ANTARES MARKET interface (hereinafter - "ANTARES MARKET rules"):
3.3. Обязательства Компании по предостав: 3.3. The Company's obligations to provide services in accordance with a user's orders are counter to the user's obligations to comply with the rules of the service and to pay for services. If a user fails to fulfil these obligations, the Company may suspend or refuse to provide services in the relevant part on the basis of the powers stipulated by law.
3.4. Компания оказывает услуги при налич: 3.4. The Company provides services if it is possible to provide them, which is determined, inter alia, by users' compliance with the rules of ANTARES MARKET. Failure to comply with the ANTARES MARKET rules may lead to the impossibility of the Company to fulfil its obligations to provide the relevant services.
3.5. В силу характера предлагаемых Компа: 3.5. Due to the nature of the services offered by the Company, which are aimed at meeting users’ individual needs to purchase goods, works, services and other offers, under the Agreement, the Company does not assume obligations to provide services to each person who contacts it and may refuse to provide services to a user ... For example, in cases where the provision of services does not comply with the rules of ANTARES MARKET.
3.6. Некоторые услуги на сервисе ANTARES: 3.6. Some services on ANTARES MARKET may be available only for certain categories of users.
3.7. Условия предоставления конкретных у: 3.7. The conditions for the provision of specific services under the Agreement, including their content, scope and timing, are determined in the relevant Terms of Service and other ANTARES MARKET rules.
3.8. Предоставляемые на сервисе услуги м: 3.8. The services provided on the service can be changed, supplemented, and updated, and as such, their use is offered “as is”, that is, in the form and volume in which they are provided by the Company at the time users contact the various services.
3.9. Компания вправе направлять вам по и: 3.9. The Company has the right to send you, using the contact information available in your profile, notifications related to the execution of this Agreement or any of the transactions concluded under the Agreement, including notifications about the status of service provision, renewal methods, changes in the terms of service and other information messages, via SMS and push messages, as well as email.
3.10. Вы обязуетесь соблюдать при пользо: 3.10. When using the services, you agree to comply with the requirements of current legislation, the provisions of the Agreement, the relevant terms of the selected service and all other ANTARES MARKET rules.
3.11. По требованию Компании вы обязаны: 3.11. At the request of the Company, you are obliged to provide information and documents required to identify a user as a party to the Agreement, in particular when sending applications, requests and other requests to the Company related to the provision of services on ANTARES MARKET. To identify private users, the Company may request the full name, series and number of the identity document, a scanned copy of the identity document, the email address and the phone number and used to access the profile. In addition, the Company has the right to independently verify the user as a party to the Agreement by verifying the details specified in the profile with the payer's details under the Agreement, as well as in other ways.
3.12. Стороны признают действия, соверше: 3.12. The Parties acknowledge actions performed using the user's login and password as actions performed by the user and having the force of an electronic signature.
4.1. Компания обязуется предпринимать вс: 4.1. The company undertakes to make all reasonable efforts to properly provide services, but does not answer and does not compensate a user's losses if the user cannot use the services for the following reasons:
технологические неисправности каналов св: technological malfunctions of public communication channels through which access to services is carried out, the user's loss of access to the Internet for any reason, errors, omissions, interruptions in work or data transmission work or data transmission, defects in communication lines and other technical failures;
несанкционированное вмешательство в рабо: unauthorised interference with the service of third parties, including those caused by hacking, DDoS attacks, actions of virus programs and other disruptions to ANTARES MARKET;
утрата пользователем доступа к профилю,: loss of access to the profile by the user, including if there are signs of unauthorised use of it;
при наступлении обстоятельств непреодоли: in the event of force majeure circumstances.
4.2. В случае причинения убытков пользов: 4.2. In the event of damage to the user through the fault of the Company, liability shall be determined in the manner prescribed by the legislation at the place of jurisdiction of the Company. At the same time, the Company’s liability to users using the service for entrepreneurial and other professional activities shall be determined in an amount not exceeding the cost of the service ordered and paid by the user but not received through the fault of the Company, or, if applicable, in an amount not exceeding the user's Wallet balance at the time losses are caused and only if the user loses part or all of the funds on the Wallet balance through the fault of the Company.
4.3. Компания не отвечает перед пользова: 4.3. The Company shall not be liable to a user for losses incurred by the user through no fault of the Company, including in connection with a user’s violation of ANTARES MARKET rules.
4.4. Компания не несет ответственности з: 4.4. The Company shall not be responsible for the transfer or receipt of user funds in payment for services. Security, confidentiality, and other conditions for the use of your chosen payment methods are determined by agreements on payment acceptance between a user and the corresponding organisations.
4.5. Вы отвечаете за любые действия, сов: 4.5. You are responsible for any actions taken on the service using your data to enter ANTARES MARKET (including the actions of employees and third parties) and for losses that may arise due to unauthorised use of your profile and simple electronic signature.
4.6. В случае кражи, утери данных для вх: 4.6. In the event of theft or loss of login data, you shall independently take the necessary measures to change the password you use to access your profile. The Company shall not be responsible for the actions of third parties that result in the theft, loss of your login data, as well as any costs, damage or loss of profits incurred by a user in connection with unauthorised access by third parties to a user profile.
4.7. Компания не гарантирует соответстви: 4.7. The Company does not guarantee that ANTARES MARKET services will meet a user's expectations and that the user will receive a response from visitors to the advertisements posted by him in connection with the receipt of services.
5.1. Споры, возникшие в рамках настоящег: 5.1. Disputes arising under this Agreement must be considered in court at the place where ANTARES MARKET LIMITED is registered (SCOTLAND EH12 9DQ, EDINBURGH).
5.2. До обращения в суд пользователь с п: 5.2. Before going to court, a user with a legal entity profile must comply with an out-of-court dispute resolution procedure by sending a written claim to the Company, attaching documents that confirm the circumstances and requirements to which a user refers. The term for consideration of such claims is no more than 30 days from the date of receipt of the claim by the Company.
6.1. Договор вступает в силу с момента е: 6.1. The Agreement takes effect from the moment it is signed in the manner specified in section 2 of the offer; it is valid for an indefinite period until its termination in accordance with the Agreement and legislation.
6.2. Компания вправе изменять и/или допо: 6.2. The company has the right to change and/or supplement the offer to the extent permitted by law, as well as to withdraw the offer at any time. The date of the change of the offer shall be the date of publication of the new version of the offer on ANTARES MARKET. You must familiarise yourself with the current version of the offer posted on the ANTARES MARKET platform and the terms of each transaction before concluding the Agreement and completing a transaction.
6.3. Заказ услуг и совершение пользовате: 6.3. Ordering services and making a transaction by a user under the Agreement after changes in the offer take effect means that the parties have agreed to make the appropriate changes and/or additions to the Agreement. Such changes in the Agreement do not apply to services ordered and paid for by the user prior to the changes in the offer taking effect.
6.4. Компания вправе расторгнуть Договор: 6.4. The Company has the right to terminate the Agreement in the manner prescribed by law, including in the event of a single violation by a user of the law, the terms of the Agreement or ANTARES MARKET rules, notifying the user about this via the ANTARES MARKET interface, by e-mail or in some other way.
6.5. Договор может быть прекращен досроч: 6.5. The Agreement can be terminated early at the initiative of a user. If the user has not used the profile on ANTARES MARKET for 2 years, the Agreement shall be considered terminated at the initiative of a user after the specified period. Upon termination of the Agreement, you have the right to apply to the Company for the return of the unused balance of funds in the amount of the Wallet balance, excluding bonuses provided. The return of the unused balance of funds shall be carried out on the basis of a written application from a user in the form established by the Company for the means of payment used for services; if it is impossible to use this means of payment for the return of funds, another way determined by the Company should be used.
6.6. При обращении за возвратом неисполь: 6.6. When applying for the return of the unused balance of funds, the user, at the request of the Company, shall be obligated to identify himself as a party to the Agreement by performing the actions specified in the Company instructions (send an application from the email address specified in your profile, use the phone number specified in your profile and confirmed in the manner prescribed by ANTARES MARKET, etc.), as well as provide the necessary documents and information (including documents required for user identification, documents confirming that a user has made payments, etc.).
6.7. Договор представляет все условия, с: 6.7. The Agreement represents all the conditions agreed between the parties in relation to its subject matter, and supersedes all previous agreements, representations and any kind of agreement between the parties in relation to its subject matter, unless otherwise expressly agreed by the parties.
Эта политика описывает, как ANTARES MARK: This policy describes how ANTARES MARKET LIMITED (“the company” or “we”) process and protect the personal data of ANTARES MARKET users.
Политика применяется как к зарегистриров: The policy applies to both registered and unregistered users ("users" or "you"). The policy applies regardless of the device you use to access ANTARES MARKET and regardless of the communication channel you use to apply.
Предоставляя нам персональные данные, вы: By providing us with your personal data, you consent to us processing it in accordance with this policy.
Персональные данные – любая информация,: Personal data – any information that relates directly or indirectly to a specific individual who is either identified or identifiable (subject of personal data).
Обработка персональных данных – осуществ: Processing of personal data – any actions or set of actions in relation to personal data, including collection, recording, systematisation, accumulation, storage, updating and modification, extraction, use, transfer (distribution, provision, access), blocking, deletion and destruction – both with and without the use of automated data processing tools.
Мы обрабатываем персональные и техническ: We process personal and technical data.
Вы предоставляете нам персональные данны: You provide us with personal data when you:
используете сервис ANTARES MARKET и услу: use ANTARES MARKET and the company’s services;
участвуете в мероприятиях, исследованиях: participate in events, research and surveys;
пользуетесь правами и выполняете обязанн: exercise rights and fulfil obligations on the basis of:
Ваше устройство автоматически передает т: Your device automatically transmits technical data, including information stored in cookies, information about the browser and its settings, the date and time you access ANTARES MARKET, the addresses of the requested pages, actions on the website or in the app, technical characteristics of the device, IP address, etc.
Мы обрабатываем персональные и техническ: We process personal and technical data to:
предоставлять вам возможность пользовать: give you the opportunity to use the company’s services (e.g., create a profile, pay for services, etc.);
обеспечивать стабильную работу и безопас: ensure stable operation and security, as well as improve user experience, service quality, and the company’s marketing activities;
предупреждать и пресекать нарушения зако: prevent and combat violations of the law, the ANTARES MARKET terms of use, and the service agreement;
выполнять обязанности, предусмотренные з: fulfil the obligations required by law (e.g., for accounting, tax reporting, and responding to requests from government agencies);
организовывать ваше участие в мероприяти: arrange for your participation in events, company research and surveys, as well as those of our partners;
and for other purposes with your consent.
для заключения, исполнения, изменения ил: for the conclusion, execution, amendment or termination of the agreement - the ANTARES MARKET terms of use and the service agreement;
для осуществления прав и законных интере: to exercise the rights and legitimate interests of the company or third parties if doing so does not violate your rights and freedoms;
для выполнения обязанностей, возложенных: to perform the company’s legal obligations;
если данные общедоступные (в открытом до: if the data are publicly available.
Мы не обрабатываем специальные категории: We do not process special categories of personal data. We do not process biometric personal data for identification purposes.
5. Сервис ANTARES MARKET – открытый исто: 5. ANTARES MARKET – an open source of data
Относитесь ответственно к размещению инф: Be responsible for posting information online. Any internet user can see your reviews and the public section of the profile by visiting ANTARES MARKET.
Цель, с которой пользователи размещают д: Users post data to ANTARES MARKET in order to establish contact with a potential buyer (client, employer) who is interested in concluding a transaction. User data cannot be processed for any other purpose. Calling users to offer them your services is prohibited. User data cannot be copied in order to post and store on other services. Open data cannot be used for scoring. All of this is illegal.
Ответственное отношение к персональным д: Our company’s standard involves a commitment to treat personal data responsibly.
Издали и опубликовали на сайте политику: Have published a user data policy on our website. We have also enacted bylaws regarding the processing and protection of personal data. Employees are introduced to these documents on their first day with the company.
Оцениваем риски и вред, который может пр: Assess risks and damage that can occur in the event personal data protection laws are violated. Based on our assessment, we choose suitable measures to ensure legal compliance.
Применяем правовые, организационные и те: Employ legal measures, managerial procedures and technological controls to ensure the security of personal data.
Принимая меры по защите персональных дан: In taking measures to protect personal data, we rely on:
установленном уровне защищенности персон: a set level of personal data protectability;
актуальных угрозах, определенных моделью: actual threats identified by a threat model;
базовом наборе мер защиты, установленном: a basic set of protective measures established by statutes and regulations for the appropriate level of protection;
риск-ориентированном подходе при выборе: a risk-based approach when choosing optimal measures;
Мы прекращаем обработку ваших персональн: We stop processing your personal data upon:
по истечении срока согласия или при отзы: expiry of the consent period or withdrawal of consent (if there are no other grounds for processing stipulated by law). You consent to 5 years from the date of your profile’s deletion on ANTARES MARKET. A different term may be envisaged in individual cases;
по достижении целей обработки либо при у: achievement of processing objectives or if there is no need to achieve them (if there are no other grounds for processing stipulated by law);
при выявлении неправомерной обработки, е: detection of illegal processing, if ensuring lawfulness is not possible;
Закон требует, чтобы мы хранили информац: We are legally required to store user information for a year after a profile is deleted.
Чтобы задать вопрос или отозвать согласи: If you have a question or wish to withdraw consent to the processing of personal data, please contact the help desk by e-mail.

Как разместить объявление на Antares Mar: How do I Post an Ad on Antares Market?
Для того, чтобы разместить объявление ну: To place an ad, you need to register.
Затем войти в свою учетную запись и нажа: Then log into your account and click the button "Submit your ad" on the main page.
Далее заполните все необходимые поля, пр: Next, fill in all the required fields, select a category and a subcategory of the product.
Укажите цену в долларах. Цена в биткойн: Please indicate the price in dollars. Bitcoin price will automatically appear in the field. Please note that the minimum price for placing an ad is $10.
В поле “Адрес кошелька” укажите ваш адре: In the Wallet address field, enter your bitcoin wallet address to receive the money after the sale.
Если вы хотите продать ваш товар за Anta: If you want to sell your item for Antares Dollar, then just check the box next to the currency name. In the Wallet address field, enter your Antares ID for receiving AND after the transaction. AND will be credited to the Start Wallet of your Antares personal account.
Проверьте, что вы корректно заполнили вс: Check that you have filled in all the fields and indicated the price correctly, and click "Create ad".
После этого ваше объявление получит стат: After that, your ad will receive the "Awaiting moderation" status. Wait for the managers to check your ad and approve it. Then the status will change to "Open
Как только найдется покупатель по вашему: As soon as there is a buyer for your ad, you will see a payment request in the Requests section inside the ad. To do this, enter the ad from the "My ads" section. The "Pending payment" status means that the buyer has placed an order for the purchase of your product, but has not yet paid for it. The "Payment received" status means that the buyer paid for the item in your ad.
Нажмите на кнопку “Получить оплату” если: If the application has the "Payment received" status, click "Receive payment". Then hand over the item to the buyer.
Как только покупатель получил товар он н: As soon as the buyer has received the goods, he clicks on the "The deal was completed" button. After clicking this button, the money for your item will be transferred to the wallet address you specified in the ad. AND are instantly credited to your Start Wallet and the specified Antares ID. In the case of BTC, funds are usually credited within one hour (except in cases of increased load on the Bitcoin network).
Как купить товар на Antares Market?: How to Buy an Item on Antares Market?
Для того, чтобы купить товар на Antares: To buy an item on Antares Market, you need to register.
Найдите интересующее вас объявление и на: Find the ad you are interested in and click on it.
Свяжитесь с продавцом. Обсудите детали с: Contact the seller. Discuss the details of the deal. You can find the seller's contacts by clicking "Show contacts".
Выберите способ оплаты, нажмите на соотв: Select a payment method, click on the corresponding payment button. Then click "Get address".
Укажите свой кошелёк для случаев возврат: Please enter your wallet address for return cases.
После система выдаст вам реквизиты для п: After that, the system will give you the details for transferring money.
Переведите деньги на выданный адрес ровн: Please transfer money in the exact amount as indicated in the ad to the issued address. This is important!
После того как система зафиксирует вашу: After the system registers your payment, you will see that the status of the ad has changed to "Payment made".
Дождитесь когда продавец примет оплату и: Wait until the seller accepts payment and gives you the items.
Перед окончательным принятием товара осм: Before you accept the goods, examine the appearance, condition, performance and compare it with the description in the ad. If all is well, accept the goods and click on the button "The deal was completed" in the ad.
Если по каким то причинам вы отказываете: If for some reason you refuse to accept the goods and transfer money for the ad, then open a dispute. Describe the situation to the managers, and we will refund your money!
Как пополнить кошелек AND на Antares Mar: How to Top Up an AND Wallet on Antares Market?
Для того, чтобы пополнить кошелек AND на: To top up your AND wallet on Antares Market, you need to do the following:
Найдите раздел “Мои счета”. Далее нажмит: Find the "My Accounts" section. Then click "Withdraw funds" from the Bonus Wallet.
В открывшемся окне нажмите по иконке Ant: In the window that opens, click on the Antares Market icon.
Затем укажите сумму вывода и ваш ID в An: Then enter the withdrawal amount and your Antares Market ID. You can find your Antares Market ID by clicking on the profile icon in the upper right corner of your Antares Market account.
Далее поставьте галочку “Я согласен со с: Next, check the box "I agree with the following conditions" and click on the button "Send for withdrawal".
Ваш кошелек в Antares Market будет попол: Your Antares Market wallet will be credited within 48 hours after the request is created.
Как вывести AND с Antares Market?: How to Withdraw AND from Antares Market?
Для того, чтобы вывести AND c кошелька в: To withdraw AND from a wallet on Antares Market, you need to do the following:
Go to the My Wallets section.
Укажите Antares ID куда хотите вывести д: Specify the Antares ID where you want to withdraw money and the amount.
Ваш кошелек в Antares будет пополнен в т: Your Antares wallet will be funded within 24 hours after the order is created. The funds will be credited to your Start Wallet!
Вы уверены, что хотите оплатить товар с: Are you sure you want to pay with Antares Dollar? The money will be charged from your wallet AND to Antares Market and transferred to the seller.
